    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AppConfig
    Central configuration class for application-wide beans.
    AuthController
    REST controller for authentication operations.
    AuthService
    Service class for authentication operations.
    CustomRecipeRepository
    Custom repository interface for recipe queries.
    CustomRecipeRepositoryImpl
    Implementation of custom recipe repository methods.
    CustomUserDetailsService
    Custom user details service for Spring Security.
    DuplicateRecipeException
    Exception thrown when duplicate recipe creation is attempted.
    GlobalExceptionHandler
    Global exception handler for REST controllers.
    HealthController
     
    IdGeneratorService
    Service for generating unique IDs for entities.
    JwtAuthFilter
    JWT authentication filter for Spring Security.
    JwtUtil
    Utility class for JWT operations.
    LoginRequest
    Data Transfer Object for authentication requests.
    Main
     
    ModelMapperConfig
    Configuration for ModelMapper bean setup Provides object mapping capabilities throughout the application
    OpenApiCorsConfig
    CORS configuration for OpenAPI/Swagger documentation Enables cross-origin requests for API documentation endpoints
    PasswordEncoderConfig
    Configuration class for application-wide beans and settings.
    Recipe
    Entity class representing a recipe.
    RecipeController
    REST controller for recipe management operations.
    RecipeControllerIT
    Integration tests for RecipeController endpoints.
    RecipeManagementApplication
    Bootstraps Spring application and implements command-line interface.
    RecipeNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when requested recipe is not found
    RecipeRepository
    Repository interface for recipe data access.
    RecipeRequest
    Data Transfer Object for recipe operations.
    RecipeService
    Service class for recipe management operations.
    RecipeServiceTest
    Unit tests for RecipeService business logic.
    RegisterRequest
    Data Transfer Object for user registration.
    RepositoryConfig
    Configuration class for repository setup.
    Role
    Enum representing user roles in the system.
    SecurityConfig
     
    User
    Entity class representing application users.
    UserController
    REST controller for user management.
    UserDTO
    Data Transfer Object for user information.
    UsernameNotFoundException
    Exception thrown when username is not found during authentication.
    UserRepository
    Repository interface for user data access.
    WebController
    Controller for handling the root URL and JavaDoc documentation routes.
